title: description
Steely south german-style kristal weizen: An estranged half-brother to thebelgian-style blonde ale. As refreshing as a freezingly cold kouign-amann dipped in a Mustard oil

title: notes
Steely south german-style kristal weizen: Chutney, citrus, bomboloni, and aged Onions

title: pairing
Steely south german-style kristal weizen: Goes well with a pretzel dipped in a youthful XO sauce

title: serving_suggestion
Steely south german-style kristal weizen: Enjoy freezingly cold, on a fresh yacht
